app_descript:
Brief

Dubsmash is a vibrant video creation app that injects humor and creativity into every conversation. With the ability to choose from an extensive library of sounds, users can easily create personalized video clips to share with friends and family. Dubsmash has captivated a global audience, boasting a community of over 75 million users across 192 countries, encouraging everyone to express themselves through the universal language of video.

Price

Dubsmash is a free app, making it accessible for anyone to start creating and sharing videos. However, keep an eye out for any in-app purchases or premium features that might enhance your experience. ğŸ’µ
